snippet: A federal judge denies a request by Capitol Records to close the site immediately. He says the case will determine if ReDigi is legitimate or "just Napster with an in-between step."
abstract: A federal judge denies a request by Capitol Records to close the site immediately. He says the case will determine if ReDigi is legitimate or "just Napster with an in-between step."

headline.main: ReDigi, the 'Used' Digital Music Store, Stays Alive
